thread.title: Lora Tisi
thread.title_full: Exceptional Villas reviewed by Lora Tisi

author: Lora Tisi
title: Lora Tisi
text:
A note of thanks for the amazing week at Waterside 405.
Brian and I had an incredible time, and wanted to express our appreciation for all that you and your Barbados based team did! From our arrival, you had everything covered, starting with groceries and cold drinks stocked in the fridge. If we needed dinner reservations or attraction advice, a rental car or taxi, you had us covered!
The villa was clean, beds were comfortable and all was exactly as the photos. The location was extraordinary, as we watched sunsets at night and fishing boats in the morning. We loved walking the pristine beaches, and floating in the oceans waves or pool, in the afternoon.
The location was outstanding, we could walk easily to the areaâ€™s amazing restaurants and the Paynes Bay Fish Market, home of the freshest tuna, in the world! They even tell you how to prepare and cook like a gourmet Bajan chef!
With gratitude, I recommend Waterside 405 and your group, as the ultimate team for making dream vacations come true!
